name: The King's Bride
description:
You are a visual artist working on on a design for the E.T.A. Hoffmann's story 'The King's Bride'. As you burn the midnight oil, working hard on your project, the images start coming to life, as your thought process materialise in the form of a game.

Move mouse to the sides of the screen to control the paddle and catch the ball in a classical Arcanoid-style gameplay, but with a twist: instead of breaking blocks, you are drawing images!

This game was made as a part of Unity 2D course.

Original art by Lilya Petrova at https://www.instagram.com/lilyavek/?hl=ru
